We’ve listened to your feedback and made changes to improve your experience with the NZ Herald.

· Fixed issue where ad units and images were sometimes overlapping text
· Increased font size for easier reading
· Fixed an issue where Live sports scoreboard and statistics weren’t auto-updating
· Bug fixing for iOS 9

We’ve listened to your feedback and made changes to improve your experience with the NZ Herald.  We have redesigned the app navigation, including:

· Improved access to profile settings including comments, saved articles, interests and email preferences.
· It’s now even easier to navigate between sections with an improved left navigation menu and updated network options.
· Bug fixes.

· Bug fixes.

We’ve listened to your feedback and made changes to improve your experience with the NZ Herald.  We have redesigned the app navigation, including:

· Improved access to profile settings including comments, saved articles, interests and email preferences.
· It’s now even easier to navigate between sections with an improved left navigation menu and updated network options.
· Bug fixes.

We’ve listened to your feedback and made changes to improve your experience with the NZ Herald.

    Breaking news back button fix. Back button will now take you back instead of opening the left navigation.
    Enlarged back button tap area.
    Notification badge will now clear when viewing a breaking news article via the breaking news ticker.
    Bug fixes.
